bodydiv.p: To help the Board in developing the work plan, the technical staff is asked to identify, review and raise matters that might warrant the Board’s attention. New matters may arise from the five-yearly consultation on the technical work plan or a change to the Board’s Conceptual Framework. In addition, the Board raises and discusses potential topics in the light of comments from the Advisory Council, ASAF, other standard-setters and other interested parties, and the Interpretations Committee, as well as technical staff research and other recommendations.
